title: Man Guard

verbs: To protect; to keep from harm or injury.
Maintain in safety from injury, harm, or danger
To keep safe; to defend; to guard; to prevent harm coming to.
To keep something or someone safe or prevent harm coming to someone or something.
To protect from danger; to secure against surprise, attack, or injury; to keep in safety; to defend.
To prevent, to keep (from doing something).
To safeguard a resource from attack or loss.
nouns: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)
A person who, or thing that, protects or watches over something.
Person who or thing that protects something.
A person who keeps watch over something or someone
A person who protects or watches over something.

description: The male version of the üíÇ Guardsman emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man guard emoji stands tall and authoritative, depicted in a crisp, dark uniform that showcases Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges. Realistic lighting catches the subtle sheen of his hat and jacket, emphasizing a sense of duty and protection. This emoji conveys a feeling of security, vigilance, or can be used humorously to denote someone who is being overly protective.
